NSLITE_UNITS.description: BG units for NS lite ('mg/ml' or 'mmol')

NSLITE_TARGET.description: Address of your Nightscout page including the port number ('sample.herokuapp.com')

API_SECRET.description: API_SECRET for getting the data into NS lite (has to be the same as in the target Nightscout page)

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
